Package big.process1D.filter

Interface Summary
FIRConvolver This abstract class encapsulates discrete-convolution operations on one-dimensional data.
 

Class Summary
CausalFiniteDifferences This class encapsulates causal finite-difference operations on one-dimensional data.
CausalFIRFilter This class encapsulates discrete-convolution operations on one-dimensional data with a filter that has a causal impulse response.
EvenSymmetricFiniteDifferences This class encapsulates centered finite-difference operations on one-dimensional data.
EvenSymmetricFIRFilter This class encapsulates discrete-convolution operations on one-dimensional data with a filter that has an even-symmetric impulse response.
Filter1D The purpose of this class is to store and access the impulse response of a filter.
GenericFIRFilter This class encapsulates discrete-convolution operations on one-dimensional data with a filter given in generic form.
OddSymmetricFIRFilter This class encapsulates discrete-convolution operations on one-dimensional data with a filter that has an odd-symmetric impulse response.
